      • testZeroOverlap_NoStimulusThreshold_GlobalInhibition

        public void testZeroOverlap_NoStimulusThreshold_GlobalInhibition()
        When stimulusThreshold is 0, allow columns without any overlap to become active. This test focuses on the global inhibition code path.

      • testZeroOverlap_StimulusThreshold_GlobalInhibition

        public void testZeroOverlap_StimulusThreshold_GlobalInhibition()
        When stimulusThreshold is > 0, don't allow columns without any overlap to become active. This test focuses on the global inhibition code path.

      • testZeroOverlap_NoStimulusThreshold_LocalInhibition

        public void testZeroOverlap_NoStimulusThreshold_LocalInhibition()

      • testZeroOverlap_StimulusThreshold_LocalInhibition

        public void testZeroOverlap_StimulusThreshold_LocalInhibition()
        When stimulusThreshold is > 0, don't allow columns without any overlap to become active. This test focuses on the local inhibition code path.

      • testInitPermanence1

        public void testInitPermanence1()

      • testInitPermanence2

        public void testInitPermanence2()
